name: Halloween's Eve
description:
A simple horror game made in Unity using the HDRP. This game was a solo project as part of a game jam near Halloween 2022 for the University of Washington's game dev club. 

Basic controls:

- wasd to move

- shift to move slightly faster

Note:

I purposefully added a LOT of sway in the camera while moving, so this game is NOT recommended if you have serious motion sickness.

Hint:

If you are confused about where to find the keys, there is a hint on the back door of the church.
